title: Venom card
data:
{{obsolete}} {{Flavour|The card depicts a snake peering out from a skull's eye sockets, dripping venom from its fangs.}} The Venom card unleashes a poisonous attack spell and (if the player is neither undead nor unliving) inflicts on the player the [[Virulence|poison vulnerability]] status, all determined by power level: * Power level 0: [[Venom Bolt]] and 10 to 5 turns of poison vulnerability * Power level 1: [[Venom Bolt]] or [[Poison Arrow]] and 5 to no turns of poison vulnerability * Power level 2: [[Poison Arrow]] {{crawlquote|Releasing that poison leaves you vulnerable to poison.}} The Venom card could be found in the following [[Decks|decks]] over the past several versions. {| class="prettytable" ![[0.11]] ![[0.12]] ![[0.13]] ![[0.14]] ![[0.15]] ![[0.16]] ![[0.17]] ![[0.18]] |---- !style="text-align:left;vertical-align:top;font-weight:normal"| [[Deck of destruction|Destruction]]
